SVGAttributeVisibility.summary: The visibility attribute lets you control the visibility of graphical elements. With a value of hidden or collapse the current graphics element is invisible.

blockquote.para: Note: If the visibility attribute is set to hidden on a text element, then the text is invisible but still takes up space in text layout calculations.

remarks.para: Depending on the value of attribute pointer-events, graphics elements which have their visibility attribute set to hidden still might receive events.

blockquote.para: Note: As a presentation attribute, visibility can be used as a CSS property. See the visibility property for more information.

remarks.para: You can use this attribute with the following SVG elements:
